comments.text:
Ever since 2007 when I saw it in theaters, it's become my favorite movie of 
all time. Seriously underrated. You can watch it a dozen times and each 
time notice something new, a subtle piece of repetition you didn't notice 
before, etc. And it's hilarious, and has a kick-ass action sequence. My 
theater was packed and everybody got heavily into it, cheering and 
laughing. It's great go see it if you haven't yet.﻿

+Ku Haizim Not really. The United Kingdom is a has four countries in it,

Great Britain is a geographical term, not a political term. Great Britain 
has England, Scotland and Wales in it. The full name by the way is, The 
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

comments.text:
If you have extra time this weekend, this is a great entertaining movie. I 
like Old English but this has a bit of everything including of how people 
try to demote you when you are way better than them. This reminded of a 
note one of my former editors once said: “you work so hard making the rest 
of look like we are on vacation.” Sarcasm and humor is also included in 
this movie which I hope you enjoy but please note, I have no affiliation 
with this movie and if you don't like it, don't shoot the messenger ;-) ﻿
